entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening then changing to rain showers this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
